mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(company_name, company_logo1, company_logo2) VALUES(#{company_name}, #{company_logo1}, #{company_logo2})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM company JOIN admin ON admin.company_code = company.company_code JOIN home ON admin.admin_code = home.admin_code
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name=#{company_name}, company_logo1=#{company_logo1}, company_logo2=#{company_logo2} WHERE company_code=#{company_code}
